title: Silver Jeans Co. Men's Allan Slim Fit Straight Leg Jeans
description: Straight leg jeans in a medium-dark indigo wash
Max flex denim with the highest amount of stretch for superior flexibility
Sits below the waist with a slim hip and thigh
5-pocket styling with a zip fly and button closure

Silver Jeans Co. is more than denim, it's a legacy of adventure. For 100 years, we've been crafting jeans that fit flawlessly, feel comfortable, and look great, empowering you to make every moment a story worth telling. Our denim is a canvas for your stories, accompanying you on any adventure and celebrating your unique journey. When you start in Silvers, every day is an opportunity to express yourself fearlessly.
